item.title: HUNTER×HUNTER NEN×IMPACT
item.description:
Title: HUNTER×HUNTER NEN×IMPACT
Genre: Action
Developer: Bushiroad Games
Publisher: Bushiroad Inc. , Arc System Works
Release Date: Coming soon




About This Game

The first full-scale HUNTER×HUNTER fighting game is here!

▼The 3v3 Nen Ability Team Battle is just like the “HUNTER x HUNTER” anime!

Create teams of characters to face off in 3-on-3 battles.

Find a combination with synergy, and aim for the top with your own unique team!

▼Use the Rush Button to do combos! "Aura Arts"!

Just hold down the rush button and hit the button repeatedly to unleash powerful combos!

Feel the exhilarating rush of pulling off a combo with ease!

You can perform "Aura Arts" once the Aura Gauge is filled!

Aura Arts can be activated with only a little Aura, but can deal greater damage with more Aura!

▼Smooth online battles with rollback netcode!

Face off against other players across the network to win rank points.

Your rank updates as you accumulate points. Aim to become a “three-star hunter”!

You can even compete with "G.I. Cards" at stake! Gather the cards for the specified slots!

▼A variety of single-player modes!

・Story mode

Battle against CPU opponents as you enjoy a digest of beloved Hunter x Hunter moments!

This mode includes tutorial stages, so try it out first to understand the basics of how to play!

・Collection

Collect it all！

Gather collectibles such as “Titles”, “Profile Icons”, and “G.I. Cards” when you play the Story Mode or Single Mode!

Titles and Profile Icons can be used in your profile!

Set your favorite character’s dialogue and icon!

In online play, you can challenge other players to a Player Match by betting G.I. Cards that you have obtained!

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 8/10 (64-bit OS required)
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.40 GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 16 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

item.title: Street Fighter™ 6 - Year 3 Ultimate Pass
item.description:
Title: Street Fighter™ 6 - Year 3 Ultimate Pass
Genre: Action , Adventure
Developer: CAPCOM Co., Ltd.
Publisher: CAPCOM Co., Ltd.
Franchise: Street Fighter
Release Date: Jul 15, 2025




About This Content

Year 3 Ultimate Pass
- 4 additional characters (Sagat, C. Viper, Alex, Ingrid)
- 4 additional characters' colors: Outfit 1 Colors 3-10
- 4 additional characters' costume: Outfit 2 (including colors 1-10)
- 4 additional characters' costume: Outfit 3 (including colors 1-10)
- 1 additional stage
- Bonus: 5,800 Drive Tickets

Release Schedule
Sagat Update - Summer 2025
C. Viper Update - Autumn 2025
Alex Update - Early Spring 2026
Ingrid Update - Late Spring 2026

* Additional content will be released sequentially.
* Please check the official website for product details and release schedule.

System Requirements

Windows

    • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit required)
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX1060 (VRAM 6GB) / Radeon RX 580 (VRAM 4GB)
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 60 GB available space

    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: RTX2070 / Radeon RX 5700XT
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 60 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: - The framerate may drop during graphic-intensive scenes. - Additional storage is required for each subsequent update.

item.title: Destiny 2: Reclamation Silver Bundle
item.description:
Title: Destiny 2: Reclamation Silver Bundle
Genre: Action , Adventure , Free To Play
Developer: Bungie
Publisher: Bungie
Franchise: Destiny
Release Date: Jul 15, 2025




About This Content

Purchase the Destiny 2: Reclamation Silver Bundle and receive the Lullaby Legendary emote along with 1,700 Silver (1,000 + 700 bonus Silver) which you can use to purchase the Reclamation, cosmetics, and more!

Visit the Eververse store in-game to use your Silver and buy Destiny 2: Reclamation.

To claim your new emote, visit the Special Deliveries Terminal in the Tower.

One-time purchase only available during Destiny 2: Reclamation. Silver is an in-game currency used at the Eververse store.

Destiny 2: Reclamation not included with purchase.

    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 2GB or GTX 1050 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB

item.title: Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate
item.description:
Title: Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate
Genre: Action , Adventure , Free To Play
Developer: Bungie
Publisher: Bungie
Franchise: Destiny
Release Date: Jul 15, 2025




About This Content

Purchase Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate to experience a new campaign, new destination, gear, and much more. Purchase now and receive:
Exotic Ghost
Legendary Emblem

Play Destiny 2: The Edge of Fate. Guardians will track a mysterious signal to a location at the edge of the solar system, where they will uncover a truth that redefines their future.

The Future Is Now

A new adventure and the start of a new saga in Destiny 2. World tiers allow Guardians to select the level of difficulty that is right for them and reap the rewards that come with victory. Higher tiers offer more challenge, additional narrative threads, new secrets to uncover, and more powerful gear to collect.

Access Kepler’s Secrets

Hidden deep within the Reef, a new destination awaits: the mysterious planetoid of Kepler. Explore a lost human settlement and forgotten Fallen houses, and encounter new characters, all affected by a mysterious Anomaly that has twisted the destination into something menacing.

Destination Abilities

Push the limit of your Guardian’s capabilities and unlock the mysteries of Kepler with new destination abilities, powered by the mysterious Anomaly.

New Foes

Two new enemy combatants have entered the fray. Cut down swarming masses of Vex drones known as Kobolds, and face diabolical hovering Fallen Corsairs, each intent on standing in the way of your success.

item.title: Noobs Are Coming
item.description:
Title: Noobs Are Coming
Genre: Action , Casual , Indie , RPG , Early Access
Developer: Overboy
Publisher: Overboy
Release Date: Jul 15, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Jul 15, 2025




About This Game

YOU ARE THE FINAL BOSS.

  • Arena roguelike inspired by Brotato and The Binding of Isaac where you are the Final Boss

  • Pick your Dungeon Boss from a huge, unique roster

  • Quick and Addictive Runs (<30 minutes)

  • Craft your build from a wide variety of creative and innovative mechanics:

    Equip boss attack patterns, summon minions, swing physics-based chain spikeballs, and kick wrecking balls (and play soccer with your minions or co-op partners!). Wield guns, grow plant minions with a watering can, transform enemies into sheep or golden statues (or both?), mine ore, deploy turrets.

  • Wild Theorycrafting & Emergent Gameplay : Discover unique synergies

  • Break the Game : Push your Amount or Size stats to absurd levels and watch the screen explode in chaos! Use the Cheater Item to stack unique items multiple times

  • Play as a Giant Worm Boss, Spider Queen, Seductive Succubus and more

  • Wave-Based Carnage: Survive increasingly intense raids of Noobs (+Endless Mode)

  • Level Up and Shop: Collect souls to level up and buy powerful upgrades

  • Unlock tons of content and challenges

  • Cute and Badass artstyle, Banger OST

  • Parody RPG Universe, meta humor and funny cutscenes

  • (Twitch Streamer Mode : noobs takes usernames and messages from chat)

  • Singleplayer and multiplayer

  • 4 players Local Co-op (+ Steam Remote Play Together)

NOOBS ARE COMING! Show them who's the boss

    • OS: Windows 10 or 11

Linux
